verses.roman:
bhāike bhartsinu muñi, lañā ei guṇa
sei rātre prabhu more dilā daraśana

synonyms: bhāike—my brother; bhartsinu—chastised; muñi—I; lañā—taking; ei—this; guṇa—as a good quality; sei rātre—on that night; prabhu—my Lord; more—unto me; dilā—gave; daraśana—appearance.
translation: That night Lord Nityānanda appeared to me in a dream because of my good quality in chastising my brother.
